text: Colobothea sordida is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1902. It is known from Brazil, Peru, and Ecuador.BioLib.cz - Colobothea sordida. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1902
title: Colobothea sordida
